Reset failed, please try again Remind Continuous operation time is too long，use it after 18 minutes Over-temperature，use it after 18 minutes The exception has been fixed automatically and can continue to run Device Error descend to the lowest height for reset current speed rice step cal current speed: 0 km / h automatic mode manual mode preset speed standby time setting novice guide set speed Start End manual mode automatic mode Please keep 3km / h on the walking machine already walked walking machine on walking station Press "function key" of remote control to start target 30s Press the mode key to switch to automatic mode Enter the marking area of walking machine next Please control the walking machine to Congratulations on completing the novice guide complete There is no long press mode in the current mode The current mode has long press mode Use this app to open location in the background.
